xml.name: Reuse signature types
xml.Text: We can tell that GoLand got two new intention actions that allow to reuse/expand signature types.
xml.Try: See that the caret is at the first parameter of the greeter method. Press ShowIntentionActions to invoke intention actions.
Select Reuse signature types and press EditorEnter. Notice how the signature types got combined.
Select Expand signature types and press EditorEnter. The signature returned to its initial state.
